venue.name: Reggie Lewis Center

item.description:
Boston Vegetarian Society 15th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival - FREE - Educational
Saturday, October 30, 2010 10:00 AM - and VERY child-friendly

Where: Reggie Lewis Center
1350 Tremont St, cor. New Dudley St across from Roxbury Crossing Orange Line station
Roxbury Crossing, MA 02120
617-541-3535

The Boston Vegetarian Society's 15th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival will be on Saturday, October 30, 2010, 10 AM - 6 PM, and on Sunday, October 31, 2010, 10 AM - 4 PM, at the Reggie Lewis Athletic Center 1350 Tremont Street, Boston.

For more information check out BVS website: http://www.bostonveg....
item.how_to_find_us: Maynard Clark will be upstairs most of the time on both days, listening to the high quality educational lectures
